iopair.description: perform a select Good input:1) environment variable contains only alphanumeric charactersBad input:1) environment variable contains * or -. + causes infinte loop

process.script: sleep 22 && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/psql -h ss-localhost -d booktown -p 8432 -c "SELECT * FROM books WHERE title = 'Dune'"
